TopicTitle: Crashes on certain parts, crashes when reverting, crashes when firespitter.

Articles.Content:
My ksp's on the latest version, and random stuff isn't working.

First, it crashes lots of times when reverting,

Firesplitter's part thing makes it so the graphics on any building go doofus and crash on launch/leave the building,

Parts from interstellar (Science lab and antimatter collector) have this weird bug that when i place them they don't get placed and if i try again it goes slooooooow and i need to delete it b4 it crashes,

SO MANY BUGS ;_;

Edit: I made a lil part based on the Rapier. It's the same thing but it has an Afterburner mode. It has the same problem as above for some reason, crashy crashu.

Edited October 28, 2014 by cicerocf

Nobody can help you with the level of information you provided.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29

I'll collect the logs.

edit: Omg it has over 200.000 lines what do i do?
Either upload it to a file sharing service (e.g. dropbox or one of countless others) or, if it is actually very large, then zip it first before uploading...

So, i quit ;_;

Any way to delete this thread?

We can lock it...

(But please don't give up KSP, we'll be glad to help if you run into trouble.)
